formulas.name: AgingInvoiceWarning
formulas.expression: {!LineItemInProgress.Noncredit_Invoice__r.Invoice_Number__c}&' has line item '& {!LineItemInProgress.Section_Reference__c}&' that has been idle for 28 days. Link here: '&LEFT({!$Api.Partner_Server_URL_570}, FIND( '/services', {!$Api.Partner_Server_URL_570}))&'/lightning/r/csuoee__Noncredit_Invoice__c/'&{!LineItemInProgress.Noncredit_Invoice__c}&'/view'

formulas.name: DayLateWarning
formulas.expression: {!LineItemInProgress.Noncredit_Invoice__r.Invoice_Number__c}&' has a line item that requires fulfillment but has been idle for a day: '&{!LineItemInProgress.Section_Reference__c}&'. Link here: '&LEFT({!$Api.Partner_Server_URL_570}, FIND( '/services', {!$Api.Partner_Server_URL_570}))&'/lightning/r/csuoee__Noncredit_Invoice__c/'&{!LineItemInProgress.Noncredit_Invoice__c}&'/view'
